p: CyPA plays an extremely important role in HCV, human papillomavirus (HPV), HIV-1, and bovine pox virus [ 31]. As a ligand of CyPA, it has been found that CsA can prevent the replication of most CoVs by inhibiting cyclophilin proteins, including SARS-CoV, hCoV-229E, and hCoV-NL63, as well as the avian infectious bronchitis virus [ 4, [32], [33], [34], [35]].
